snippet.title: Battle Aces - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Battle Aces in this trailer for the upcoming action RTS game for PC. Battle Aces is set in the 26th century where humanity struggles for land and resources. 

Choose between over 50 different units and guide high-tech drones controlled by mercenary commanders known as Battle Aces onto the front lines in explosive large-scale battles.

The Battle Aces closed beta begins later this month, with registration open now.
